bibl.title: A Garland of Stones: Hellenistic Lithika as Reflections on Poetic Transformation.
bibl.note: P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309, coll. i, 2-iv, 6 = 1-20 Austin-Bastianini.

bibl.title: Labored in Papyrus Leaves: Perspectives on an Epigram Collection Attributed to Posidippus (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309)

bibl.seg: SCHUR David, A Garland of Stones: Hellenistic Lithika as Reflections on Poetic Transformation.

Benjamin ACOSTA-HUGHES, Elizabeth KOSMETATOU and Manuel BAUMBACH (Edd.), Labored in Papyrus Leaves: Perspectives on an Epigram Collection Attributed to Posidippus (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309) = Hellenic Studies. 2 (Washington, D.C. - Cambridge, Mass. - London, 2004) pp. 118-122.
P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309, coll. i, 2-iv, 6 = 1-20 Austin-Bastianini.
